About Me

{

Hi! My name is Nathan Lynes.

I'm pursuing a Bachelor's in Computer Science at
Kennesaw State University, and I'm in my senior year.
Some of my interests include computer networking,
data structure analysis, and algorithm engineering.

Currently, I am working on applying my personal
interests of gardening, nature, and conservation
into the software engineering field.
With the emergence of stronger artificial intelligences,
products that implement these techs can and will play
an important roll in furthering innovation to these
special areas of interest.
